Room.Name: Beginner's Range
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Dentra Central Archery Range, in the Beginner Level area.
Room.LongDescription: Numerous young elves and various other races often come here to work on their archery skills. Although they are not very good shots yet, they are tough and can be a challenge to beat in a contest. It's funny to see they young elves easily outscoring nearly every other race present at the range.
